document_data.name: Sagacious Slumber
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sagacious Slumber''' was a religious event observed by devout followers of [[Sseth]], the World Serpent.
document_data.Activities: This month long period of hibernation was observed by all [[Ssethsar]]. The hibernation overlapped with midwinter into the month of [[Alturiak]]. The Sagacious Slumber was preceded by a shocking revel where large numbers of living prey, including [[human]]s and [[demihuman]]s, were consumed by the Ssethsar and the [[serpent]]s under their care. Rebellious slaves were usually the first selections for the revel's menu.
